member.name: T:Zelda.Events.SwitchPatternGameLogic
member.summary: Represents a N-way boolean logic circuit that matches N-input objects of type with an expected state. This class can't be inherited.

remarks.para: The SwitchPatternGameLogic matches when all entries match against their respective expected states.
An example usage for the SwitchPatternGameLogic class would be an ingame puzzle that requires the player to enable FirePlaces in a correct pattern.

member.name: T:Zelda.Factions.Faction
member.summary: Represents an ingame faction, similiar to the ones in World of Warcraft. This class can't be inherited.

remarks.para: The player has a specified reputation towards each Faction. This reputation is represented by a simple integer, called the reputation value.

The following list shows what reputation value represents what .
Exalted 42000 to ~ Revered 21000 to 42000 Honored 9000 to 21000 Friendly 3000 to 9000 Neutral 0 to 3000 Unfriendly -3000 to 0 Hostile -6000 to -3000 Hated -~ to -6000
The player may gain reputation by completing quests, using/turning-in specific items or killing monsters.

member.name: T:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel
member.summary: Enumerates the different levels on the reputation table of a faction.
member.remarks: This enumeration may not be changed as the exact intager values of it are used. The possible reputation levels are set into stone for now. (more than enough anyway)

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.None
member.summary: Represents no specific reputation level.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Hated
member.summary: The lowest possible reputation level.
member.remarks: The player won't get any quests from a hated Faction. He must build up his reputation somewhere else.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Hostile
member.summary: The second lowest possible reputation level.
member.remarks: The player will only get a few quests from a hostile Faction. He must build up his reputation mainly somewhere else.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Unfriendly
member.summary: The level below Neutral.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Neutral
member.summary: The default reputation level of most factions.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Friendly
member.summary: The level above Neutral. Provides additional quests.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Honored
member.summary: The level above Friendly. Provides additional quests.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Revered
member.summary: The second highest reputation level.

member.name: F:Zelda.Factions.ReputationLevel.Exalted
member.summary: The highest reputation level.
member.remarks: The exalted level is pretty hard to archive, but gives the ultimate rewards of the faction.

member.name: T:Zelda.FogOfWarStatus
member.summary: Stores the visability state of the Fog of War for a single ZeldaScene. This class can't be inherited.
member.remarks: The Fog of War is used to hide undiscovered places on the Mini Map. This is done by splitting the scene into a grid of size 32x32. Each cell in this boolean grid states whether the specific position has been uncovered by the player.

member.name: P:Zelda.FogOfWarStatus.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the visability state at the given position (in FoW-space).
member.param: The position on the x-axis (in FoW-space).
The position on the y-axis (in FoW-space).
member.returns: true if the player has uncovered the area at the given position; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Zelda.FogOfWarStatus.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the visability storage used by this FogOfWarStatus.

member.name: M:Zelda.FogOfWarStatus.Uncover(Atom.Math.Vector2,Zelda.ZeldaScene)
member.summary: Uncovers the fog of war at the given .
member.param: The position in world-space.
The related ZeldaScene.

member.name: T:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixedItem
member.summary: An is an item that is composed by compining a base , an and an .
member.remarks:
Affixed items allows the game to generate many-different 'randomized' items.
'Brutal Demonsword of the Kings'
'Brutal' is the prefix, adding +Strength (based on item-level). 'Demonsword' is the base item. 'of the Kings' is the suffix, adding +All Stats%.

member.name: T:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.None
member.summary: The item doesn't have any affix.

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.Prefix
member.summary: An stands before the base item.

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.Suffix
member.summary: An stands behind the base item.

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.Both
member.summary: Both affixes are allowed: An and an .

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.AlwaysBoth
member.summary: The item must have both affixes: An and an .

member.name: F:Zelda.Items.Affixes.AffixType.AlwaysOneOrBoth
member.summary: The item must have one or both affixes: An and/or an .

member.name: T:Zelda.Items.Affixes.IAffix
member.summary: Item affixes are used to randomly 'customize' items.
member.remarks: Most affixes scale with the level of the item they are applied to. Affixes are supposed to be immutable objects, that always behave the same. IAffixes can be pulled from the .

member.summary: Gets the localized name of this IAffix.

member.name: M:Zelda.Items.Affixes.IAffix.Apply(Zelda.Items.Item,Zelda.Items.Item)
member.summary: Applies this IAffix to an Item.
member.param: The Item that gets directly modified by this IAffix.
The base non-modified Item.

member.name: M:Zelda.Items.Affixes.IAffix.IsApplyable(Zelda.Items.Item)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this IAffix could possibly applied to the given base .

member.returns: True if this IAffix could possible applied to the given ; otherwise false.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... the Wind Sword of Hyrule. The protectors of time and space were entrusted to keep the sword hidden of the evils that have been foreseen to come. ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Items.ItemResources.ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_4
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... And those times came, the great evil in form of Ganon emerged to destroy all we loved. His avaricious mind wanted almost nothing else than to get his hands on the mighty sword. ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Items.ItemResources.ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_5
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... Using the powers of the sword he could shape Hyrule as he wishes. And it almost came that way ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Items.ItemResources.ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_6
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... Today we call it the Legend of the Winds, but I tell you it is far from a legend. Thunder and rain were moaning for weeks after Ganondorf has found the Temple of Time. ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Items.ItemResources.ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_7
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... But as Ganondorf reached for the sword, a great light, brighter than anything you've seen before, filled the temple. Din herself, the goddess of power, broke the sword into seven pieces and spread them all over Hyrule. The story ends by presaging that one day a young boy will come and reforge the mighty Wind Sword of Hyrule to fight the evils. One day..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.ItemOnUse_NewQuest
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to On Use: New quest!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.ItemOnUse_NewQuest_Letter_BreakSealAndRead
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to On Use: Break the seal and read the letter..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_Home_Fireplace
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to As you inspect your fireplace you notice a strange indentation in the form of a locket that encloses three triangles. Where does it come from? You don't have anything that fits....

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_MissingKey_Special
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Blocked... hmpf. It seems like you need a special key to unlock it. .

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_NoKey_ShimmeringCrystal
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There seems to be an indentation in the stone. What could fit into it..?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_NoKey_SmallUniversalWind
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The key block speaks with a dark voice: "GIVE ME A SMALL WINDY KEY, AND YOU SHALL BE ALLOWED TO PASS BY.".

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.MN_Tingle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Merchant Tingle.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.MN_TravelingSalesman
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Traveling Salesman.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.NewQuest_CantEverAccept
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You get this feeling that you already know all that is there know about this. Meh....

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.RouteOfDin_WindSwordBlock_NotUnlocked
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The inscription on the block says: 'Only a true Hero may open this lock.' As you try to push it you see that the key-hole is S-shaped..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.SignPost_Empty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... You stare at the sign post and see absolutely nothing interesting. ... ... ... ... ....

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.SignPost_TiaWoodsDirections
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to > > Hyrule Rivers ^ > Minor Shrine ^ < Route of Din.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.Talk_Crow_Start
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Awk. Kra. Kraaa. Kraaaaaaa. Kraakra. [Let me. I want to watch the floating bones.] Kraaaa. Krah! [Go away!] Kra.. krah.. Kraka.. Kraa? Kra. [Hmm.. does it understand what I say? No.. never. Krah.].

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You've been nice. But my brother is still cuter!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to La la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la ... Do you like me singing?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Aren't I the most absolutely fabulous person you have ever seen? -blinks at you-.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_GhostBuster_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I'm the best ghost hunter of not just Hyrule Rivers and all Hyrule, BUT also the complete world !!! And no, none will ever surpass me..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_GhostBuster_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ghosts here? Call me and I'll send you to do the work. Hehehe ....

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_GhostBuster_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to When I hunt ghost I do it in a slick way. See? Ssssslick. Sssssliiickkk. Study my ways and you may be like me one day ~!!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I must really say that ... ... you're just as ... erm ... cute as my brother! -blinks-.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Some day people will sing their own songs just about you!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey! How was your day? Do you want to play together with me?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I'm the best ghost hunter of not just Hyrule Rivers and all Hyrule, BUT also the complete world !!!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ghosts here? Call me and I'll fix the problem. Hehehe ....

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to When I hunt ghost I do it in a slick way. See? Ssssslick. Sssssliickkk..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Goron_Mindo_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Did you know that the mad Gorons also somtimes carry Black Goron Keys? I wonder why.. Where are all these blocks that would fit those keys?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Goron_Mindo_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It's terrible! Some of the Gorons have gone mad! What do we do?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Seiri - Throw away all rubbish and unrelated materials in the workplace..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Seiton - Set everything in proper place for quick retrieval and storage..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Seiso - Clean the workplace; everyone should be a janitor..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_4
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Seiketsu - Standardize the way of maintaining cleanliness..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_5
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Shitsuke - Practice the 5S daily, make it a way of life; this also means 'commitment'..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_Maja_6
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Seiri, Seiton, Seiso, Seiketsu and Shitsuke. These are my ways..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_BoyBilly_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I'm Billy the Hilly, oh soooo ... erm ... Who are you again?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_BoyBilly_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy is my name. Honor me and I shall allow you to be in my sight!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to My brother is soooo cute compared to you..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to La la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la ... WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Aren't I the most absolutely fabulous person you have ever seen?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldMan_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Isn't the weather just perfect lately?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oh oh oh! Have you seen my children lately?.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The sun has gone from the shining skies, Bye, baby, bye, The dandelions have closed their eyes, Bye, baby, bye. The stars are lighting their lamps to see. If babes and squirrels and birds and bees, Are sound asleep as they should be, Bye, baby, bye..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The squirrel keeps warm in his furs of gray, Bye, baby, bye, 'Neath feathers, birdies are tucked away, Bye, baby, bye. In yellow jackets, the bees sleep tight. And cuddle close through the chilly night, My baby's snug in her gown of white, Bye, baby, bye..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_4
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Do you know how to make Red Dye? It's quite simple with a little magic! All you'll need is a Small Empty Bottle, two piles of Skeleton Bone Powder and five Red Potions! Trust me boy, trust me. Hehehe..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TiaWoodsTingle_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nothing in stock for you? Just come back later!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It's all my younger brother's fault. Tell him that!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I can't remember how we got here..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Standing outside here all day and night is getting old and boring..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It's all my older brother's fault. Tell him that!.

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Where's my mother? Aaaaaaa. Aaaaaaaaaaa. Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa..

member.name: P:Zelda.LocalizableTextResources.TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I'm sooo hungry. I want fish!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nice work I must say. You shall be my pupil from now on!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You did it! Now my old pupil can rest in peace. His necklace shall be yours..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Mhmhm.. those are good! What? Aah.. the key.. I've actually still had one. There you go..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Thank you! You're such a cutie!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Thank you, thank you! *cheers*.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You've slain the evil that was corrupting us? Yes .. I already feel relieved. Thank you. Thaaaank you! You are our hero! I want you to remember this song, so we can see each other anytime..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It's so silent outside. Have my brothers found peace?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Exactly what I needed. I hope I didn't make you too much trouble..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ooohh oooo. That's so cute from you! Thank you. Thaaanks! -hugs-.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Wow. Nice. But the evil still lurks inside the tombs ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Yee ha! You're just awesome..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You're our hero! Now me and my brother can venture inside the tombs too..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... you've survived ... impressive!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Heureka! Thanks..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You brought me mushrooms? What mushrooms? Why? Ohhhhh ... the Ghost Mushrooms! Great! Now I can make the potion for Milly!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_HungryKid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Yipiii! Thank you..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello there. My dad sent you to me? ... ... grr ... Why are you doing this to me dad? ... grr ... You should know that you're the third that comes to get his reward -just this week-..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Where did you get this letter? Did you read it? ... Boy boy. This will get complicated for you. You'll now work for us..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You are accusing me of beating my younger sister? ... WHAT THE HELL IS YOUR PROBLEM? THIS IS NOT YOUR PROBLEM. ... Feel free to bother my mother and father with this. But please just go now and do your work..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nicely done. Thanks for the portrait! Your reward? ... hmph ... I guess I really have to give you something now. You can have this relic of mine, as I don't need it anymore..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You've done as I said? Very well. Listen boy. I warn you, don't do the ritual again..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Thanks thanks thanks thanks! You've saved me! Have you met my mother before? She has a small camp in the far north east..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Awww. That's too kind of you for helping me out..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ... It was moms order to let Billy beat me ... ?! :'(.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Yes, yes. I'm Maja! My younger brothers sent you ..? I'm glad that they are are okay..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheSister
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Why, hello there! Waaaah... my brother sent you ..? o_o.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hah! It seems dad has finally sent someone who could finish our work in the woods. Your reward shall be ... I've got more for you to do!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nice nice. Good work I must say..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QC_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Very well. This should do it. Ehehehe ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ghost Buster Karl told me I could become a Ghost Buster if I show him what I can do..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ghost Buster Karl wants me to avenge his old pupil by killing the redish ghost. I can have a ghost necklace if I manage kill the ghost..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The goron inside the hut will craft me a black key if I bring him what he needs..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Maja wants me to buy her some Chicken Feed from the Travelling Salesman that recently arrived in Route of Din..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Maja in the Route of Din wants me to secure her chickens by securing the area..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The route of din is turning into a place of madness. I must figure out the cause of this change. I should return to Maja if I have any new information..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The goron inside the hut can't take it that his brothers have gone mad. Maybe I should help him out....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The strange old man wants me to find him 3 empty bottles. He said that the skeletons to the south may have some..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The yoyo child-doll has been heavily abused. It'll be required to replace some parts of it. Maybe I should fire up my Magical Bottle! 5x Fabric + 1x Red Dye should fix it. I wrote the crafting recipes into my Recipe List..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to make the tombs a safer place..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to make the tombs a safer place again. This time I should hunt the female demons..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The older kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to attack the evil at its roots. The demon master must die..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Boy Billy wants me to clear the fields to the west of him..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The strange old man wants me to bring him 5 fresh leaves for his medicine. They can be found just north of him..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The old woman in the north-east of the Tia Woods wants me to bring her 4 Ghost Mushrooms. She indicated that I might want to visit the Hyrule Rivers to the east of the woods..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_HungryKid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The younger kid outside the Stone Tombs wants me to bring him some fish. He's hungry!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The old man told me that I'd have to meet his son Billy if I want a reward for my help. He thinks that Billy can be found somewhere to the south..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I should deliver the unsealed letter to this so called mother. Maybe she got something to say regarding its very strange content. The skeletons are supposed to follow the orders of Billy?!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy seems to beating his younger sister. I really should speak with him..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy wants me to bring him the portrait of his father. It's somewhere in the Tombs of his family. I can find the tombs in the south east of the Tia Woods..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The old witch in the north east of the Tia Woods wants me to perform the fire ritual at the ritual place somewhere in the south west of the Tia Woods. To perform the ritual I must simply lit the fires in the right pattern..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Milly, the sister of Billy, wants me to bring her the secret-map of the family tombs. She said that the map would be somewhere in the woods north-east of her, guarded by razor blades..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The father of Milly assured me that he's going to talk with Billy about Milly. I better bring Milly the good news..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I've spoken with Milly's mother about Billy beating her. I should really talk with Milly about all this..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The boys at the stone tombs in the Tia Woods want me to travel to the Route of Din to meet their older sister Maja. The entrance to the Route of Din can be found in the north west of the Tia Woods..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheSister
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy wants me to speak with his sister. She can be found somewhere to the south of him..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy wants me to revenge his family by hunting the Skeletons in the Tia Woods..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Billy requires my help once more! This time I should bring him 25 Skeleton Bones and slay some of those red skeletons..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QD_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The old woman in the north-eastern parts of the Tia Woods wants me to bring her Keese Tooths and Wings..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QN_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Ghost Hunt.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Do ghosts scare you?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Slay the red Ghost King ..! And try to not get eaten alive..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Still waiting.. for the required materials. Be quick about it! The hunger is eating me up alive..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You don't want my chickens to hunger, do you?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You must save my poor chickens!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Every day more of my chickens get mad .. -sobs-.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oh, oh. Their sounds ... why ... please help me ..!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I really need those bottles before I can make my medicine. Hurry!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Don't be too shy to say that the tombs scare you. You don't have to go inside ... just stay here with us..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to They'll try to seduce you. Watch out..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You MUST help us. Please. If we don't stop the evil now it will spread over all Tia Woods..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Why have you not completed your quest yet? Scared ... hehe ... ?!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hurry! Bring me the leaves. There are some north-west of here..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Mushrooms from Ghosts. I need!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_HungryKid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Huuuuuuuuuuuuuuungry. Me want fish! FISH..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Get me this portrait at all costs..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to What are you waiting for? Don't just stand there..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Pleeeeeeeeeeeeeease help me to find the map! Or my brother will ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to What's taking so long? Come on try harder! Do it for your friend Billy! Or the reward, THE reward!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scared of the Red Skeletons? Muahahah aa... !.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QNC_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to What are you waiting for? Hunt those bats for their wings and tooths!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_HyruleRivers_GhostHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey you! Come here and listen! I've just lost my pupil to one of those ghosts. I'll make you my new student if you show me what you can do. For starters simply kill 12 ghosts. Hehehe. Some day you may become a great ghost buster - just like me..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_HyruleRivers_TheEvilGhost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to My last pupil was killed by the Ghost King that lives deep in the woods of Hyrule Rivers. Now go and avenge him. If you succeed then you can have his old ghost necklace..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_RouteOfDin_BlackKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Have you seen the black block? We've sealed the pathway beyond. If you bring me 1x Goron Steel and 3x Goron Croisants, then I can craft you a key to open it. Especially the Croisants are important! They should be around here somewhere...

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_RouteOfDin_ChickenFeed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Wait, a sec. The travelling salesman has recently arrived! Could you get me some Chicken Feed? Please!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_RouteOfDin_SecureTheChickens
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The evil Blood Keeses that have appeared last month eat my poor little baby chickens! And some of the older chickens turned -all- mad after they have been bitten. We must figure out this mystery! Bring me a few feathers of the mad chickens, and on the way slay some of those Bloody Keeses!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_RouteOfDin_TheCauseOfMadness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to These lands are changing and you must stop it ... before everyone turns completely mad. You seem like a strong fighter. Please figure out what is going wrong..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_RouteOfDin_TheMadBrothers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oh dear, my beloved brothers have gone mad! I'm so sorry that someone innocent like you has to see this. But I can't take this anymore. Please ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_StoneTombs_Wanted_Skeletons
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WANTED: Any adventurer with courage to slay atleast 10 green skeletons. .

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_BottlesForTheMedicine
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to What..? You want your answers now? Boy, first - I've forgotten my medicine bottles at home. And I really need them. Bring me some from the Skeletons to the south..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to As you inspect the doll you can clearly see that it is broken. If one could just repair it... 5x Fabric + 1x Red Dye should do it. To create Red Dye I will need 1x Small Empty Bottle + 2x Skeleton Bone Powder + 5x Red Potion..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey you! How did you get here? I think some strange boy sent us here ... I really can't remember. Do you see the entrance next to me? That's the entrance to the Family Stone Tombs. Just recently it was overrun by monsters. You look rather strong. Can't you help us out and make the place a bit safer? Those green skeletons scare us ....

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An even greater evil than some skeletons has infested the tombs. And my feeling tells me that they will leave the tombs soon. Just don't tell my younger brother~. He'd be scared to death! All I can tell you is that they are evil, eat fish and are female! Get them!!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_CleanseTheTombs_3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I have one last wish from you. Attack the evil at its roots by slaying the master demon. You shall have my Hyrule Boots if you succeed..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_ClearTheFields
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey you. Do you want to work for me? Of course you do. I'm Billy. Everyone wants to help me. Anyway I need you to do some work for me. I need the fields to the west to be cleared of those skeletons and skeleton heads. I may give you a reward. Just go! Or are you too scared?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_FreshLeaves
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Why, hello there too. You are asking what is going on? Well.. I won't tell you... until you bring me 5 fresh leaves for my daily medicine! There should be some just north of here. Would you be so nice?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_GhostMushrooms
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello hello! Do you hear me? Can't you just simply bring me 4 Ghost Mushrooms? Yes, yes. You should be able to find some at the Hyrule Rivers. *coughs* No need to get wet just yet. Simply cross the bridge in the far south east. *coughs*.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_HungryKid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey you. Do you have some food for me? I mean.. some fish. I want fish! Any fish! Come please bring me some. Don't you smell the fish from the tombs?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_MeetBilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to About your questions... I actually... don't know. Sorry. But thanks anyway. Go talk to my son, Billy and he will give you a reward for your work. He should be somewhere to the South..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You break the seal of the letter and read: ............... Dear mother, I hope this letter reaches you quickly. Those skeletons are just too stupid to follow orders. I've sent two more 'adventurers' to the family tombs. The demon master will be -very- happy with us. Now back to the case with my little sister Milly. Have you managed to create the potion for her? I'd help you but I'm just too busy. Your Billy <3..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TalkToBillyAboutMilly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Now that you've brought me the map my brother won't hurt me. Billy is such an acerb brother. Why?? :'((.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheFamilyPortrait
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The tombs of my family are hidden in the south east of Tia Woods. Go there and find me the portrait of my father. If you do that then I'll forget about our little quarrel..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheFireRitual
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Boy boy. I now want you to find the ritual place to the far south west. Perform the fire ritual by simply litting the fires in the right pattern. Do what I say or you'll face the consequences..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheLostMap
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello stranger! Nice to meet you! I'm Milly, the future princess of these lands. You've helped my dear brother Billy? Oh dear ... my brother ... He has been acting strangely lately. And now he wants the secret-map of the family tombs back! He'll hurt me again if I don't bring the map back. :'( The map is somewhere in the woods, guarded by those razor blades. Please, please bring it to me!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheNiceFather
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello. Who's there? Oh, you the young fighter. Your deeds already reached my kind ears. What do you say? Billy seems to beat poor Milly? Hmm ... You must know that we must train her to endure all physical and mental stress. Anyway, I'm going to talk with Billy about Milly. Beating her is indeed too much..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheNotSoNiceMother
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello hello! You must speak louder or I won't hear you! ... Yes. I am the mother of Milly. And it's known to me that Billy beats Milly. It was my order after all. Be gone now..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheRouteOfDin
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Phew, thanks again for your help. I fear that our older sister Maja is in trouble too! She has been protecting our chickens. You may find her near the Route of Din in the far north west. Hey, take this key. It will allow you to leave this island quickly! Please, help our sister!.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheSister
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey, don't just run off. If you havn't spoken to my sister yet.. You will help her too. She should be hiding somewhere to the south..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHunt
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to My family owns large parts of the Tia Woods. All was great until the skeletons came and most of our workers fled. Those bastards! Your next quest shall be to avenge me and my family. Hunt those skeletons like you've never hunted something else before! Your reward is near ..! Oh, and before I forget it ... if you see my lil' sister - tell her to HURRY..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_TheSkeletonHuntContinues
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hey again. More work before we're finished. First, you must bring me at least 25 Skeleton Bones. I need them to make Skeleton Dust. Oh, and slay some Red Skeletons on your way, alright?.

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QS_TiaWoods_ToxicPreparations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hmpf.. I've indeed ran out of Keese Wings and Tooths. Go out and hunt some of those bats for me..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QuestGoalDesc_GetItem
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Get {0}! Got {1} of 1..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QuestGoalDesc_GetItems
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Get {0}s! Got {1} of {2}..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QuestGoalDesc_KillEnemies
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hunt {0}s! Killed {1} of {2}..

member.name: P:Zelda.Quests.QuestResources.QuestGoalDesc_KillEnemy
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hunt {0}! Killed {1} of 1..

member.name: T:Zelda.Profiles.IGameProfile
member.summary: An stores all the data one has to know about a player.
member.remarks:
The different profile types:
ShortGameProfile - provides only the basic data about the player, Created when the user enters the Character Selection Screen. Must be converted to a GameProfile before it can be loaden.
GameProfile - provides all the data about the player.

member.name: T:Zelda.Skills.Melee.ShieldWallSkill
member.summary:
Shield Wall is an active ability that when used reduces damage taken by all sources by 20.0% per level for a total of 60%.
Shield Wall also reduces damage done and the movement speed of the Player as a penality for using the Skill. Shield Wall doesn't cost Mana and is active until deactivated.

member.name: T:Zelda.Skills.Ranged.HeadshotSkill
member.summary:
Headshot is a swift ranged instant attack that can only be used after getting a critical ranged attack.
You aim for the head after getting a critical attack, firing a swift partially armor-piercing arrow that has an improved chance to crit and pierce of 10/20/30%.

member.name: T:Zelda.Status.StatusEffect
member.summary: Defines the abstract base class of all StatusEffects that manipulate a ZeldaEntity.

remarks.para: StatusEffects aren't bound to a specific entity, but are globally shared among all entities. We use this system because StatusEffects are designed to be modified only during design time.
StatusEffect are applied to a statable Entity by adding them within an to the of the statable entity.

member.name: P:Zelda.Status.StatusEffect.Identifier
member.summary: Gets an unique string that represents what this manipulates.
member.remarks: The Manipulates value is looked at when an chooses to find all StatusEffects that apply to one specific kind of status. Examples would be "Strength", "Crit" or "AtkSpd".

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.None
member.summary: No specific stat.

member.summary: Strength increases Melee Attack Power (MAP), and to a small amount how much damage may be blocked by the shield.

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.Dexterity
member.summary: Dexterity increases Ranged Attack Power (RAP), the hit chance, to a small part also Melee Attack Power, and reduces the cast-time of spell.

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.Agility
member.summary: Agility increases Chance To Dodge, Melee and Ranged Attack Speed and to a small part Armor.

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.Vitality
member.summary: Vitality increases Life Points, the Life Point Regeneration and also increases the chance to resist status changing StatusEffects.

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.Intelligence
member.summary: Intelligence increases Magical Attack Power (MagAP), the amount of Mana, and Mana Regeneration.

member.name: F:Zelda.Status.Stat.Luck
member.summary: Luck increases the chance to get a Critical Attack and the chance to find rare items.

member.summary: Gets the available number of Item Points for the item with the given semantics.

The quality of the item.
The slot the item goes in.
member.returns: The item budget available to be spend.

The total dexterity of the item.
The total agility of the item.
The total vitality of the item.
The total intelligence of the item.
The total luck of the item.

member.returns: The slot modifier value for the given EquipmentSlot.

member.name: T:Zelda.Talents.Classes.CharacterClass
member.summary: Represents the character class of the player.
member.remarks:
The player becomes a specific class by simply investing into the four talent trees: Melee, Ranged, Magic and Support.
Each of those trees is divided into levels. Based on those levels the current class is choosen.

member.name: T:Zelda.Talents.Ranged.HeadshotTalent
member.summary:
The HeadshotTalent provides the player with the HeadshotSkill.
Headshot is a swift ranged instant attack that can only be used after getting a critical ranged attack.
You aim for the head after getting a critical attack, fireing a swift partially armor-piercing arrow that has an improved chance to crit and pierce of 10/20/30%.

member.summary: The chance to crit and pierce the Headshot attack has over a normal ranged attack per talent level.

member.summary: The cooldown of the Headshot attack.

member.summary: The mana needed per point of base mana.

member.summary: The multiplier used to calculate the speed of Headshot Arrow.
member.remarks: 30% faster.

PoisonedShot is a ranged attack that does (RangedDamage * InstantDamagePenality) plus (RangedDamage*DamageOverTimeMultiplier) nature damage over time. The effect also slows down the enemy by X% per TalentLevel.

member.name: T:Zelda.Talents.Talent
member.summary:
A talent is an improvement to the player's character. The player can aquire them by investing talent points, which he gets each level-up.
Every level 1 extra talent point, but on every 5th level 2 extra points and on every 10th level 3 extra points.s
Talents come in two forms; passive Talents which are always active and active Talents which the Player has to active. These active Talents are also called Skills.

member.name: T:Zelda.Talents.TalentTree
member.summary: The TalentTree stores the talents of the player in a tree like structure.
member.remarks:
There are four roots that each spawn individual 'trees':
Melee - Contains melee talents. Ranged - Contains ranged/rogue talents. Magic - Contains magic talents. Support - Contains talents that support the other three main trees.
This class can't be inherited.

member.name: F:Zelda.Talents.TalentType.None
member.summary: If the type has not been set or is unknown.

member.name: F:Zelda.Talents.TalentType.Active
member.summary: An active talent requires the player to do something; e.g. trigger a skill.

member.name: F:Zelda.Talents.TalentType.Passive
member.summary: A passive talent is active without the player having to do anything actively.

member.name: T:Zelda.ActionTileId
member.summary: Enumerates the different action tile ids used in the game.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.Invalid
member.summary: An invalid ActionTileId.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.Normal
member.summary: An normal ActionTileId, nothing special happens here.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.Solid
member.summary: A solid ActionTileId, solid objects get blocked by these.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.SolidNotAffectingFlying
member.summary: A solid tile, which doesn't affect flying entities (such as arrows, magical bolts or the fairy).

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.SolidForAll
member.summary: A solid tile, which is solid FOR ALL objects, even 'ghost like' ones that have IsSolid set to false.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.WaterSwimable
member.summary: A water tile, where if possible, the object can swim in.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.WaterWalkable
member.summary: A water tile, any object can walk in it.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.FloorUp
member.summary: When triggered the object moves one TileMapFloor up.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.FloorDown
member.summary: When triggered the object moves one TileMapFloor down.

member.name: F:Zelda.ActionTileId.FallUnsafe
member.summary: An unsafe tile, the object 'falls' down.
